metadata.scenario: Customer service interaction about a delayed package

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to find out where my package is. The tracking information hasn't updated in days and it was supposed to be delivered yesterday. I'm getting a little frustrated.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello, I am sorry to hear that your package is delayed. Can I please have your tracking number so I can look into this for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 927483615027. And I'm just curious, what happens if the package is actually lost? Am I just out of luck?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I've checked the tracking and it seems the package is currently at our distribution center and is expected to be delivered tomorrow. If the package is lost, we will begin a formal investigation. Depending on the value, you may be eligible for a refund or replacement. I will monitor the status of the package and reach out to you with any updates. Is there anything else I can help with?
